items.sentence: The last time I saw Tom he was wearing a tuxedo.
Tom\'s memory\'s getting worse as he gets older.
Perhaps we could talk about this somewhere else.
I can\'t wait to find out how I did on the test.
How long did it take you to get to Tom\'s house?
Tom\'s right hand began to shake uncontrollably.
Tom told me that he was going to sell his house.
Tom took a knife out of a drawer in the kitchen.
I\'m not interested in anything you\'re selling.
Do it yourself or hire someone to do it for you.
